medical_history.chief_complaint: Blurred vision in the right eye.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 8 days earlier with hazy vision and periorbital pain. Visual acuity decreased gradually over the next 5 days, with discomfort rated 2 to 3 on a scale of 0 to 5. Nasal congestion and headache persisted, and he continued taking pseudoephedrine. The discomfort remained rated as 2 to 3 one day before admission.
medical_history.social_history: Born in India; immigrated to the United States 2 years earlier. No history of smoking, alcohol consumption, or illicit drug use.
